channel.title: map on FA Blog
channel.description: Recent content in map on FA Blog

item.title: Bivariate Choropleth Plot using sf and ggplot package
item.description: Goal The goal of this blogpost is to learn how to draw a bivariate map using “ggplot2” and “sf” package. I am very closely follwing the instruction from this tutorial A little about the dataset The example dataset contains a list for the geophaphy of the United Kingdom (UK) at UTLA level and related attribute table. You can think the UTLA as a small geographic unit (i.e., region) in the UK.
